home.title: Welcome to the enrollments system
home.subtitle: This is your homepage
home.question: If you have any question on JHipster:
home.timeLineHeader: How will your race for the best groups look like?

timeLine.findCoursesDescription: Select courses where you want to enroll. Not all are obligatory - when they bolong to one selectable module you have to choose.
timeLine.filterGroupsDescription: Select the best groups. Filter them day of classes, lecturer or other parameter.
timeLine.enrollDescription: Is there a place in a group which suits you? Enroll!
timeLine.requestOverLimit: Request to lecturer for enroll over limit
timeLine.requestOverLimitDescription: There is no place in any of groups that suit you? You can send the tutor a request to enroll over limit (if he allowed).
timeLine.repeatDescription: Repeat until you enroll in all required courses.
timeLine.checkScheduleDescription: Check your schedule. Make sure the classes do not overlap.

home.like: If you like JHipster, don't forget to give us a star on
